conbody.p: You can pass parameters to the XSL stylesheets shipped with Conversa to customize the appearance of your publications.
Select the XSL Parameters tab in the Preferences dialog to adjust your stylesheets.

image.alt: Preferences dialog showing the XSL Parameters tab

conbody.p: Use the Export XSL Parameters button to save the current set parameters to an XML file and the Import XSL Parameters button to restore a set of customized settings at any time.
The Load Default Values button restores the default values for all parameters in all stylesheets. Use this option if you made a configuration mistake or want to reset all settings at once.
The Show Reference Guide button opens a separate window showing this chapter in a Web Help version of this user guide.
